description.english: The most important part of a new journey.
Followed after Eclair, and heard her story.

Rook and Kila ended up getting along.

You gave the stuffed bear to Kila.

Met the other rocking fox, Shock.
Triggered the Shock and Rocker subplot.
Triggered the Rocker variant of the Shock and Rocker subplot.
Discovered the truth of the convention center.

Eclair will try to move on.

She just requires more and more.
